DOC.detailed_description: Satiety refers feeling fullness lack desire eat follow consumption food meal . A number dietary factor show influence satiety , include food volume , food weight , energy density , food palatability , certain food ingredient . The nutritional composition meal appear also play significant role individual 's feeling satiety ability stay full next meal .
DOC.criteria: premenopausal Females Ages 1855 BMI 18.529.9 Willing maintain weight throughout study period Subject history surgical intervention treatment obesity Recent history use weight loss drug , herbal supplement diet program try loose weight Gains lose 6 pound study period Current history eat disorder Restrained eater Excludes food meal diet History presence clinically important cardiac , renal , hepatic , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , biliary , pancreatic neurologic disorder Signs infection Heavy user caffeine alcohol Unconventional sleep pattern ( e.g . work 3rd shift ) Subject pregnant planning become pregnant study period
